name: Design Hero
description:
Join the best creative agency to fight evil clients in this visual novel based in NY.

Your character is a newly graduated college student with big dreams. After getting a job at the prestigious Jagger&Jones agency, becomes an intern to the demanding director Angie Jones. Prove your skill to survive the clients without being harmed.
You’ll encounter design briefs, information and also the client meetings to present the design projects.
Do you have what it takes to be a Design hero?

* Start as an intern and level up as a partner or maybe start your own company.
* Customize your character and office space!
* Depending on your decisions, your alliances or your enemies.
* Multiple endings.
* Micro games and dates with your colleagues. 
* More than 5 hours of gameplay.
